segments.text: It was really hard for our parents to save money when they were young .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Most people were living form hand to mouth . How could they ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . They simply had no extra money to save up or for other things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fortunately , things are changing these years .
segments.speaker: S2
